title: Imposes additional requirements on notary publics and alters form of acknowledgement
summary: Requires notary publics to maintain a journal of notarial acts; clarifies the standards used by notary publics to identify document signers in order to safeguard against forged signatures on documents; provides standard forms for acknowledgements to be used by notary publics.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to notary publics
